reviewText: Came right on time in great packaging, and just as described.  They may not be Hollywood blockbusters, but I know someone who will love both of these movies, so to be in one package is fantastic!

I love getting these packages.  You can get both Blu-Rays for alot less than they cost singly.  Especially when they are running a sale.  They had this two pack on sale for 9.99.

Movie wise - Hancock - If you like superhero flicks, it's a nice twist.
Ghost Rider - bad acting, flaming head, cool motorcycle, instant B classic.
This is great value getting 2 blurays for under $20. If you enjoy seeing 6 award wining actors and actresses having fun playing superheros, these movies are for you.
Now you too can own the worst movies ever made! This two pack contains movies that should have never been made. I would highly recommend spending your hard earned money on anything else...
